paras.content: We measure ourselves by the success of our clients, and we won't allow technology to be a hindrance to your success. Aligning ourselves as your strategic business partner, we are committed to providing the best technology solutions and then supporting them with unparalleled customer service.
Our customers typically have 20 employees or more, and rely on their computers, networks and custom business applications to work reliably all the time.
Charter Technology Solutions currently has experience supporting clients in the Finance and Education fields.

If you know a friend, colleague or family member affiliated with an organization that has technology needs Charter Technology Solutions can fill, refer us. If your lead converts into a service agreement with the prospective client you referred, we will pay you a 10% referral commission towards the first month's dues.
